channel.title: nVidia card required to play Crysis.
channel.description: Okay, I couldn't find an answer anywhere else so... I recently went out and bought Crysis, but there's one thing I didn't completley think through: do I [i]need[/i] an nVidia GPU to play Crysis. I have an ATI HD right now on this PC. Thanks ahead.

item.title: nVidia card required to play Crysis.
item.dc:creator: Mango_Assassin
item.description:
gordonfreemantshephard:

Crysis runs fine on my ATI radeon HD 5670. Have you seen benchmark videos on youtube that use ATI cards?

Yeah there still very pretty.

wins

item.source: nVidia card required to play Crysis.

item.title: nVidia card required to play Crysis.
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Meh, hadn’t planned on running it max graphics… Just because the graphics are realistic and all doesn’t mean I’ll enjoy gameplay. I’ve tried the game and it works on my GPU. That’s all I wanted to know so I could stop the Installer if not. Either way I already took the game back because the game was overhyped due to graphics. The gameplay was too mediocre for me to get through it, so IMO the only great thing about the game was graphics, which annoys me. Soooooo, next time I get an answer based on the question and facts other than opinions. I never asked what was required to play it maximum graphics, just to run it. Greatful for the answers though, thanks.

Read full topic

item.source: nVidia card required to play Crysis.

item.title: nVidia card required to play Crysis.
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
I played through Crysis with no hitches whatsoever (apart from the occassional frame rate drop) with a 4850, e6750, XP and 3gb DDR2. All graphics settings on high, 2xAA.

There are certain proprietary technologies Nvidia own such as PhysX and their brand of 3D vision however I don’t know of any PC game that will only play on Nvidia cards.

Any developer who tried to do this would probably be sued along with Nvidia by ATI for fowl play. Not to mention the community backlash.

Read full topic
